text: The Fiat Idea is a car produced by Fiat from 2003 to 2012. == Models == File:Fiat Idea front 20071102.jpg|5-door MPV (Idea) File:2006 Fiat Idea front.JPG|5-door MPV (Idea) File:Fiat Idea Adventure in Betim, Brasil.jpg|5-door crossover (Brazilian Idea Adventure) File:Fiat Idea rear 20071102.jpg|5-door MPV (Idea) == Engines == === Petrol engines === * 1.2 16V 59 kW (80 hp) * 1.4 8V 57 kW (78 hp) * 1.4 16V 70 kW (95 hp) === Diesel engines === * 1.3 Multijet 16V 51 kW (69 hp) and 66 kW (90 hp) * 1.3 Multijet II 16V 70 kW (95 hp) * 1.6 Multijet 16V 88 kW (120 hp) * 1.9 Multijet 8V 74 kW (101 hp) Idea Category:Front wheel drive vehicles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Fiat Idea
